ThingDef.label: cargo container
ThingDef.description: Simple cargo container which can be used to store items.

ThingDef.label: small pallet
ThingDef.description: A flat small pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Sometimes difficult to manage, but useful nonetheless.

ThingDef.label: medium pallet
ThingDef.description: A flat pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Sometimes difficult to manage, but useful nonetheless.

ThingDef.label: large pallet
ThingDef.description: A flat large pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Sometimes difficult to manage, but useful nonetheless.

ThingDef.label: small boxes pallet
ThingDef.description: A flat small pallet for packing things.Protect against the weather. Sometimes difficult to manage, but useful nonetheless.

ThingDef.label: medium boxes pallet
ThingDef.description: A flat pallet for packing things. Protect against the weather. Sometimes difficult to manage, but useful nonetheless.

ThingDef.label: large boxed pallet
ThingDef.description: A flat large pallet for packing things.Protect against the weather. Sometimes difficult to manage, but useful nonetheless.

ThingDef.label: animal feeder
ThingDef.description: Small feeder for pets.

ThingDef.label: animal trough
ThingDef.description: Simple trough for feeding animals whith hay, kibble or raw food.

ThingDef.label: meat hooks
ThingDef.description: A tall frame with several hooks hanging from chains to store the dead bodies of fellow animals.

ThingDef.label: food bags
ThingDef.description: A set of simple bags for storing raw plants.

ThingDef.label: food barell
ThingDef.description: A barrel for storing raw food.

ThingDef.label: box
ThingDef.description: A simple wooden storage for multiple items.

ThingDef.label: spacer container
ThingDef.description: A complex spacer level box with automatic sorting system allows you to store multiple items and retrieve them easily.

ThingDef.label: vanometric storage
ThingDef.description: Strange container that allows to store a huge amount of items. Paradoxically, its interior is shown as being much larger than its exterior, commonly described as being "bigger on the inside". This technology is developed by archotechs, and is beyond even most glitterworld societies.

ThingDef.label: minibar
ThingDef.description: A simple storage for social drugs and alcohol.

ThingDef.label: medical cabinet
ThingDef.description: A set of cabinets and shelves for stocking medicines and drugs.

ThingDef.label: weapons locker
ThingDef.description: A high-capacity metal locker for securely storing many weapons. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.label: personal lockers
ThingDef.description: A high-capacity metal locker for securely storing apparel. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.label: weapon rack (melee)
ThingDef.description: Simple medival rack for melee weapon.

ThingDef.label: weapon rack (bows)
ThingDef.description: Simple medival rack for bows.

ThingDef.label: weapon rack (shields)
ThingDef.description: Simple medival rack for shields.

ThingDef.label: wall meal rack
ThingDef.description: A tall rack for storing ready-made meals, which can be mounted in the wall for transferring meals between rooms.
